divs: sighting detailsi was driving down rte 24 south in raynham\bridgewater area bringing my daughter to the doctors and right before 495 exit and i looked up in the sky and saw what looked like a plane at first but then i said that could not be a plane the lights were moving side to side and a where very bright as bright as a cop cars emergency lights would be. they were white lights. i went to get my phone out to take a picture and it dissapeared and then reappered in another area. ther was another bright light directly accross from it that was also too bright to be a plane and it was to light out to be a star. i have never seen any lights at that time when driving in that area and i am in that area there off and on all the time. there was several cars on the road at that time i was hoping that someone else saw it.
Summary: I was driving down rt 24s near burger king raynham looked up in sky and saw flashing lights too bright to be a plane they were going side to side dissapeared and then reappeared in different location
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Bridgewater
There were no other sightings in Bridgewater on or around November 5th 2008
